name: Punch Drunk Love (Acorn Games, pixelcrustpunk, MattFett, Rover Games)
name_original: Punch Drunk Love (Acorn Games, pixelcrustpunk, MattFett, Rover Games)
description:
Modern love is hard. Help the cupid brothers help the lovelorn by forging connections with the power of friendship and fists!

Cupid 1

Movement: WASD

Punch: Space Bar

Dash: Left Shift

Cupid 2

Movement: Arrow Keys

Punch: Enter

Dash: Right Shift

Lovelorn pedestrians will cross the screen, each displaying a different colored heart. If you punch two individuals with matching hearts (one with each cupid) they will forge a connection and leave together.

Beware: If a pedestrian leaves the screen without a connection, you will lose a life. Lose 6 and you lose the game!

The pedestrians come in ever-increasing waves. See how many connections you can forge!
